tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hi,I  have been traveling with them for last one year.Dr.Divya Sivaraman is so friendly and approachable. She thoroughly studied our past history  and past treatment. I have done 7 IVF in the past. She found our root cause and now I  have a precious little boy. I have gone through all the treatment but nothing worked for me.I  work in overseas.Generally IVF treatment are not  personalised but here in srushti it is more personalised than a general protocol for all patients. I  stayed here for one year under close observation with Dr.Divya. She is very approachable, ready to answer all your doubts and phone call at anytime to clear any doubts.No much waiting time during consultation or regular visits during pregnancy. I have attended both porur and Ramapuram branch. All staffs are very friendly and knowledgeable. I highly recommend this hospital to couples who wish to have a little ðŸ˜‡ ðŸ‘¼ angel.

review: We consulted Dr Divya on video consultation. Highly professional and recommended! Dr was on time and patiently listened to our concerns. provided proper feedback and helped us come out of our mental trauma.
